scripts.prod: npm run create-dist && npm run minify-glsl && npm run build && node scripts/wrap.js && npm run minify && node scripts/replace.js && npm run html && npm run zip
scripts.dev: npm run create-dist && cp ./src/shaders/* ./dist/shaders && npm run build && cp ./dist/game-concatenated.js ./dist/safe-space.min.js && node scripts/replace.js && npm run html
scripts.coverage: npm run create-dist && cp ./src/shaders/* ./dist/shaders && npm run build && npm run instrument && cp ./dist/nyc/dist/game-concatenated.js ./dist/safe-space.min.js && node scripts/replace.js && npm run html

scripts.zip: mkdir ./dist/safe-space-eric-rowell-js13k-2021 && cp ./dist/index.html ./dist/safe-space-eric-rowell-js13k-2021/index.html && cd ./dist && zip -9 -r ./safe-space-eric-rowell-js13k-2021 ./safe-space-eric-rowell-js13k-2021 && cd .. && echo ================== && ls -l ./dist/safe-space-eric-rowell-js13k-2021.zip && echo ==================
